feed.title: UnisonUI releases
feed.subtitle: Keep yourself up-to-date about all releases

entry.content:
ğŸª² Bug Fixesâ€‹

  • ğŸ› configuration file wasn't detecting changes properly (#244)

ğŸ‘» Code Refactoringâ€‹

  • ğŸ’¡ rename packages and references to them
    • BREAKING: ğŸ§¨
  • restui has been renamed to unisonui in the configuration
  • restui.providers has been moved to tech.unisonui.providers

ğŸ Choreâ€‹
